verses.verse: Now when <S%H87>Abram<s%> was ninety-nine <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I am <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty;<s%> <S%H1980>Walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me, and be <S%H8549>blameless.<s%>
"And I will <S%H5414>establish<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you, And I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%>"
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"As for Me, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> is with you, And you shall be the father of a <S%H1>multitude<s%> of <S%H1995>nations.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> shall your <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> But your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H85>Abraham;<s%> For I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you the father of a <S%H1>multitude<s%> of <S%H1995>nations.<s%>

"And I will <S%H6509>make<s%> you <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> of you, and <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from you.

"And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you and your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> to be <S%H430>God<s%> to you and to your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you.

"And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to you and to your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4033>sojournings,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession;<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> further to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> "Now as for you, you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> you and your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H8104>keep,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you and your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you: <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among you shall be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>
"And you shall be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H6190>foreskin;<s%> and it shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> Me and you.

"And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among you who is <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> a [servant] <S%H3211>who<s%> is <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> or <S%H4736>who<s%> is <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> from <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1121>foreigner,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not of your <S%H2233>descendants.<s%>

"A [servant] <S%H3211>who<s%> is <S%H3211>born<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> or <S%H4736>who<s%> is <S%H4736>bought<s%> with your <S%H3701>money<s%> shall <S%H4135>surely<s%> be <S%H4135>circumcised;<s%> thus shall My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> be in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

"But an <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people;<s%> he has <S%H6565>broken<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>"

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> "As for <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> your <S%H802>wife,<s%> you shall not <S%H7121>call<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> but <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> [shall be] her <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> her, and <S%H1571>indeed<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H1121>son<s%> by her. Then I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> her, and she shall be [a mother of] <S%H1471>nations;<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5971>peoples<s%> shall <S%H1961>come<s%> from her."

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> and <S%H6711>laughed,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "Will a child be <S%H3205>born<s%> to a <S%H1121>man<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>? And will <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> who is <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1323>old,<s%> <S%H3205>bear<s%> [a child?]"
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3863>"Oh<s%> that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> might <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee!"

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H61>"No,<s%> but <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> you a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac;<s%> and I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

"And as for <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> you; <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> him, and will <S%H6509>make<s%> him <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> him <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%> He shall <S%H3205>become<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5387>princes,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

"But My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> will <S%H3205>bear<s%> to you at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H312>next<s%> <S%H8141>year.<s%>"
And when He <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>talking<s%> with him, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [the servants] <S%H3211>who<s%> were <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4736>who<s%> were <S%H4736>bought<s%> with his <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H376>men<s%> of Abraham's <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> in the <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> to him.
Now <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was ninety-nine <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>

And <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>
In the <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of his <S%H1004>household,<s%> <S%H3211>who<s%> were <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> or <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> from a <S%H1121>foreigner,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> were <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> with him.
